content.name: trash_can
content.label: Trash Can
content.gloss: a container for the disposal of dry waste matter

content.name: cover
content.label: Cover
content.gloss: a cover or lid or top for a trash can, including all handles or knobs on top of it

content.name: cover_lid
content.label: Cover Lid
content.gloss: a lid that covers the trash bin container, potentially movable (without handles, knobs or the other accessories)

content.name: cover_handle
content.label: Cover Handle
content.gloss: a handle, or a knob for a trash can cover that people can pull the lid up using the handle

content.name: cover_frame
content.label: Cover Frame
content.gloss: a fixed cover frame that connects to the trash can container

content.name: cover_support
content.label: Cover Support
content.gloss: a supporting component that supports and connects a trash can cover to the container

content.name: container
content.label: Container
content.gloss: a container (box or basket) that contains the trash, including handles, foot taps and the other accessories, excluding the outside frames that is outside of the main container

content.name: container_neck
content.label: Container Neck
content.gloss: a top part of a trash can container that is a rim, connector, or a part that has different geometry from the main container part

content.name: container_handle
content.label: Container Handle
content.gloss: a handle, or a knob on a trash can container body that is used to lyft up the entire box and move the entire trash can

content.name: container_box
content.label: Container Box
content.gloss: a holistic part for container main body, usually made of plastic, steel, etc.

content.name: container_basket
content.label: Container Basket
content.gloss: a part with basket or net structure for container main body, usually made of plastic, steel, etc.

content.name: container_bottom
content.label: Container Bottom
content.gloss: a clearly part that is at the bottom of a trash can container and touchs the ground

content.name: container_foot_tap
content.label: Container Foot Tap
content.gloss: a foot tap that is associated with a trash can container and can be stepped by human foot to open the trash can lid

content.name: outside_frame
content.label: Outside Frame
content.gloss: a set of parts that is outside the main trash can container and is used to support the main trash can

content.name: frame_horizontal_bar
content.label: Frame Horizontal Bar
content.gloss: frame horizontal bar

content.name: frame_horizontal_circle
content.label: Frame Horizontal Circle
content.gloss: frame horizontal Circle

content.name: frame_bottom
content.label: Frame Bottom Surface
content.gloss: frame bottom surface

content.name: frame_holistic
content.label: Holistic Frame
content.gloss: holistic frame

content.name: frame_vertical_bar
content.label: Frame Vertical Bar
content.gloss: frame vertical bar

content.name: wheel_base
content.label: Wheel Base
content.gloss: a wheel base of a trash can to enable human to drag the trash can and move it by wheels

content.name: base
content.label: Base
content.gloss: the base of the trash can

content.name: foot_base
content.label: Foot Base
content.gloss: Foot Base

content.name: leg_base
content.label: Leg Base
content.gloss: Leg Base

content.name: surface_base
content.label: Surface Base
content.gloss: Surface Base

content.name: side_surface
content.label: Side Surface
content.gloss: Side Surface

content.name: surface
content.label: Surface
content.gloss: Horizontal Surface

content.name: foot
content.label: Foot
content.gloss: Foot

content.name: leg
content.label: Leg
content.gloss: Leg

content.name: wheel_connector
content.label: Wheel Connector
content.gloss: a connector part between two or many wheels

content.name: caster
content.label: Wheel Assembly
content.gloss: a pivoting roller attached to the bottom of furniture or trucks or portable machines to make them movable

content.name: brake
content.label: Brake
content.gloss: a restraint used to slow or stop a vehicle

content.name: caster_yoke
content.label: Caster Yoke
content.gloss: forked part for connecting wheel to mounting plate

content.name: caster_stem
content.label: Caster Stem
content.gloss: post part of caster rig

content.name: caster_mounting_plate
content.label: Mounting Plate
content.gloss: a sheet of metal or wood or glass or plastic

content.name: wheel
content.label: Wheel
content.gloss: a simple machine consisting of a circular frame with spokes (or a solid disc) that can rotate on a shaft or axle (as in vehicles or other machines)
